gui.form.utility

Class OkButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.Button
        • gui.form.utility.OkButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, Checker, FunctionTypable, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>

    public abstract class OkButton
extends Button
implements Checker
    OK Button that can be added to Forms. The OK Button can check constraints.
